Posted By: GainsBanding (2/1/2011 4:20:29 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The disparity in rating between cards like Aladdin and newer cards like [Master Transmuter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Master Transmuter) is interesting to me.  
Especially since most of the time, the complaint about Aladdin is that he is 4 mana for a 1/1 body, when MT is also 4 mana but for a 1/2 body. Not much difference to warrant the huge difference in rating/viability.
